class.name: LinearInterpolator

javadoc.text: Implements a linear function for interpolation of real univariate functions.
Computes a linear interpolating function for the data set.
javadoc.param: x the arguments for the interpolation points
y the values for the interpolation points
javadoc.return: a function which interpolates the data set
javadoc.throws: DimensionMismatchException if {@code x} and {@code y}have different sizes.
NonMonotonicSequenceException if {@code x} is not sorted in * strict increasing order.
NumberIsTooSmallException if the size of {@code x} is smaller * than 2.

method.name: interpolate
method.comment: Number of intervals. The number of data points is n + 1.
Slope of the lines between the datapoints.
